section.name: HowTos
section.p: Some of the things you might wish to do with Melati.

ol.li: Download and install the JDBC-ODBC bridge software
If you are not using an existing Access DB then create an empty one
Register your DB as an ODBC Datasource with a System DSN
Update your org.melati.LogicalDatabase.properties file to select the MSAccess DmbsClass

In the build directory type
ant go
